name: Fcitx 5 Migration Wizard
summary: Import data from other input method such as Fcitx 4
description:
This is a configuration tool for Fcitx Input Method Framework v5.

It provides several tools: - fcitx5-config-qt. - kbd-layout-viewer5. - fcitx5-migrator, which helps to migrate data from Fcitx4. To migrate Fcitx4 pinyin and table data, it needs tools from libime-bin package.
